name: Swingy Dinghy
description:
How to play

Two players work together to generate waves, move the dinghy, and collect points. One player may play solo by using both alt keys.

Use the left and right alt keys to make waves and jostle the dinghy. Be careful not to shake your passengers up too much, or they might fall out!

Headphones Suggested. For extra fun, give P1 the left earbud, and P2 the right earbud.

Credits

Swingy Dinghy wouldn't have been made possible without this amazing team:

Gameplay Programming: Robert Bailey, Sean Connoly, Westley Waligora

Music & SFX: Marc Laroussini

Audio Production: Chase Slattery

Technical Artist & Producer: Noah Ratcliff

Font Used: Roboto

Made in under 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2017.
